puzzle.prompt: Someone has stolen military equipment!  Figure out who they are, what they stole, and where they hid it.

disks.title: disk 173
disks.text: Our small island nation is looking to accquire nukes from the US. Do you know who would have info on this? There will be plenty of money in it for you

disks.title: disk 142
disks.text: Friend Cuba>. We have determined your payment is sufficient. You can use our volcano to store the items. We will not inform Russia.

disks.title: disk 48
disks.text: Meet us at the Port at 10 PM. We have a great deal to discuss.
